com.newmainsoftech.spray.sprex.web.servlet.config

Interface ViewResolverConfigCase.SupportingMediaTypeCase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewResolverConfig.SupportingMediaType
    Enclosing interface:
    ViewResolverConfigCase

    public static interface ViewResolverConfigCase.SupportingMediaTypeCase
    Interface for holder of Media types what ViewResolverConfigCase implementing class supports.
    The autowiring order of ViewResolverConfigCase implementation class and SupportingMediaTypeCase implementation class in @Configuration implementation class somewhat important: SupportingMediaTypeCase implementation class must be autowired ahead in your code of &Configuration implementation class. Otherwise, NullPointerException may be thrown in autowiring ContentNegotiationManager bean. In other words, if your ViewResolverConfigCase implementation class configure ContentNegotiatingViewResolver bean, then SupportingMediaTypeCase bean must complete autowired and becomes available before autowiring ViewResolverConfigCase bean in your &Configuration implementation class.
    Author:
    Arata.Y

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ViewResolverConfigCase.SupportingMediaTypeCase.SupportingMediaTypeCommonDefualtValue 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getMediaTypeParameterName() 
      Map<String,org.springframework.http.MediaType> getMediaTypes()
      This method is to let the @Configuration implementation with this interface have ability to add supporting media types to ContentNegotiationConfigurer.

    • Method Detail

      • getMediaTypes

        Map<String,org.springframework.http.MediaType> getMediaTypes()
        This method is to let the @Configuration implementation with this interface have ability to add supporting media types to ContentNegotiationConfigurer.
        So that, this may help to concentrate view related configuration to the @Configuration implementation with this interface.
        In order to let the @Configuration implementation with this interface has the ability, such @Configuration implementation needs to be imported to sub-class of WebMvcConfigurationSupport, and this method must be call (directly or indirectly) at inside of overridden configureContentNegotiation method of that sub-class.
        Returns:
        map object for the pair of file extension as key and media type as value.

      • getMediaTypeParameterName

        String getMediaTypeParameterName()
        Returns:
        Parameter name being given to ContentNegotiationConfigurer.parameterName(String) method.
